thread.title: Citadel positions itself at the vanguard of market change
thread.title_full: Citadel positions itself at the vanguard of market change

author: Financial News
title: Citadel positions itself at the vanguard of market change
text:
Citadel positions itself at the vanguard of market change By James Rundle 21 October 2015 In becoming the first non-bank member of Swapclear, Citadel Securities (Europe) has signalled that one of the most fundamental structural transformations to come out of the 2008 financial crisis could now not only be irrevocable, but may actually have prompted a power shift in favour of the buyside.
